General.Name: Shanghai Yaoji Playing Card Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Yaoji Technology Co., Ltd. engages in mobile game, poker, and internet innovative marketing businesses in China and internationally. The company offers leisure and puzzle games, and internet mobile games. It is also involved in the production and sale of playing cards under the Yaoji brand. In addition, the company provides online marketing solutions. Shanghai Yaoji Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.
